text: @RahulGandhi Very good&productive conversation between @RahulGandhi& #AbhijeetBanerjee throwing out some solutions2present #Covid19 ill-effects on economy, #MigrantLabourers&shattered #EconomicSystem.Hope #Modi Govt will take note of opinion of Noble Laureate&act.Good effort by @RahulGandhi
